item.title: Downtown [B][C] trains are running with delays after NYPD conducted an investigation at 135 St.

item.title: Coney Island-Stillwell Av-bound [N] trains are running with delays after we replaced rails near Avenue U.
item.description: Coney Island-Stillwell Av-bound [N] trains have resumed making local stops from Kings Hwy to Coney Island-Stillwell Av.
